name: Super Mario Upgrade
description:
Every time you die you can upgrade with the points you get.

The goal is to make your way to the end of the level and defeat bowser to win.

[A/D] [←/→] - Move Left/Right

[↑] [W] - Jump

[S] [↓] - Crouch (Only as Big Mario)

[Spacebar] [E] - Special (Fire Flower)

[H] - Show/Hide Controls
